job.title: Software Engineer - Full Stack
job.description: outlast is a techenabled marketplace focused on modernizing the recycling industry goodbye fax machines our technology enables suppliers and buyers to safely and effortlessly transact their materials at the push of a button in addition to connecting suppliers and buyers we also handle global logistics financing and quality control as a company we believe in delivering an amazing customer experience and doing good for the environment by promoting recycling on the latter the proof is in the facts recycling ton of material is the equivalent to reducing the greenhouse gas emissions of more than miles in a passenger carltbrgtltbrgtthe opportunityltbrgtltbrgtwe are looking for a software engineer to join our rapidlygrowing product and engineering team remote friendly see note at bottom of post this individual will join the team in one of the following podsltbrgtltbrgtmarketplace our marketplace has been our key internal growth driver allowing us to intelligently match supply and demand in the coming months we are committing to this concept fully and making it customer facing projects here will include improving our matching algorithms driving customer usage and directly influencing our business model and sales flowltbrgtltbrgtadmin platform our admin platform enables our sales and ops teams to track and execute on complex orders across the globe projects here will involve work flows financials logistics and innovating on our industry leading quality controlltbrgtltbrgtclient platform our client platform is our customer facing interface where customers view and execute against their orders projects here will involve work flows payments and a keen eye for detail when building out amazing uiux for web and mobileltbrgtltbrgtspecial projects we are always looking for the next big thing projects here can include everything from overhauling our data pipeline and building the next great metric to implementing a new crm and integrating it into our systemsltbrgtltbrgttechnologies we useltbrgtltulgtltligttypescript ltligtltligtnextjs deployed on vercel for our front end frameworkltligtltligtnodejs backend framework modeled after nestjsltligtltligtapi integrations with various companies ranging from freight providers to major software companiesltligtltligtbigquery for our analytics stackltligtltligtgoogle cloud for our serverless api and nosql databaseltligtltligtfully automated deployments using github actionsltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtwhat you will doltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtown projects from concept to finished product work with stakeholders to define project requirements and become the internal expert in that area collaborate with our product and engineering team to plan out the various rollouts then execute on your creationltligtltligtsharpen your technical expertise learn from and teach our talented engineering team discuss technical intricacies ranging from conditional types in typescript to whether or not we should adopt dbt for our analytics stackltligtltligtdisrupt an antiquated industry that is reliant on fax machines and hand shakesltligtltligtinfluence the company beyond just the engineering team engineers are encouraged to operate like business leaders stepping outside of their comfort zones to work with our other teams and drive new processes and solutions across the companyltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtwhat were looking forltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtbs or higher in computer science or a related technical fieldltligtltligt years of experiencing using our technologies referenced aboveltligtltligtstartup experience strongly preferredltligtltligtstrong communicator who never loses sight of the detailsltligtltligtselfstarter with a rollup your sleeves mentality and a bias for actionltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtnoteltstronggt this is a remote friendly role we are open to both domestic and international candidatesltbrgtltbrgtpowered by
